items.sentence: Tom started coughing and everybody began to move away.
I can't find Tom. He hasn't already gone home, has he?
How can I feel relaxed with you watching me like that?
Tom took his kids to the hospital to see their mother.
I had a hunch that something good was about to happen.
Painting our house took a lot longer than we expected.
Because of the water shortage, I couldn't take a bath.
The Great Wall of China is more than 5,500 miles long.
I know that you don't like me as much as you like Tom.
Please try that coffee. I think it's really delicious.
